original_text: When they arrived back in Jerusalem, Jesus went into the yard of the temple. People were buying and selling things there. Jesus began to make them all leave that place. Some men were changing coins there for people. He pushed over their tables. And he pushed over the seats of the men who sold birds.
korean_text: 그들이 예루살렘에 들어가니라 예수께서 성전에 들어가사 성전 안에서 매매하는 자들을 내쫓으시며 돈 바꾸는 자들의 상과 비둘기 파는 자들의 의자를 둘러 엎으시며

sentences.original_text: When they arrived back in Jerusalem,
Jesus went into the yard of the temple.
People were buying and selling things there.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그곳에서 물건들을 사고 팔고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Jesus began to make them all leave that place.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들 모두에게 그곳을 떠나라고 하기 시작하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: Some men were changing coins there for people.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 남자들이 사람들을 위해 돈을 환전하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: And he pushed over the seats
of the men who sold birds.
